A

abort() - Method in interface org.sbrubbles.conditio.Handler.Operations
Aborts execution and unwinds the stack.
abort() - Static method in class org.sbrubbles.conditio.handlers.Handlers
A handler body that aborts execution.
AbortException - Exception in org.sbrubbles.conditio
Thrown to indicate the desire to interrupt signal processing and unwind the stack until captured.
AbortException() - Constructor for exception org.sbrubbles.conditio.AbortException
Creates a new instance.
apply(Restart.Option) - Method in class org.sbrubbles.conditio.restarts.Resume
Resumes have no meaningful value to "return"; so this method returns a "garbage" object, to be ignored.

C

call(Supplier<T>, Restart<?>...) - Method in interface org.sbrubbles.conditio.Scope
Evaluates body, providing additional restarts for it.
close() - Method in interface org.sbrubbles.conditio.Scope
Updates the scope nesting when execution leaves the try block.
Condition - Class in org.sbrubbles.conditio
Represents an unusual situation, which the running code doesn't know how to deal with, but the code that called it might.
Condition() - Constructor for class org.sbrubbles.conditio.Condition
 
create() - Static method in class org.sbrubbles.conditio.Scopes
Creates and returns a new instance, nested in the (now former) current scope.

E

equals(Object) - Method in class org.sbrubbles.conditio.restarts.Resume
If the given object is a Resume.
error() - Static method in class org.sbrubbles.conditio.policies.Policies
A policy which throws a HandlerNotFoundException when no handlers are found.

G

Returns the value produced.
getAllHandlers() - Method in interface org.sbrubbles.conditio.Scope
An object to iterate over all reachable handlers in the call stack, starting from this instance to the root scope.
getAllRestarts() - Method in interface org.sbrubbles.conditio.Scope

The option that could not be handled.
getScope() - Method in interface org.sbrubbles.conditio.Handler.Operations
Returns the scope backing this instance's operations.
getValue() - Method in class org.sbrubbles.conditio.restarts.UseValue
Returns the value to be returned in signal.

H

Handler - Interface in org.sbrubbles.conditio
Handles conditions, producing the result to be returned by signal.
Handler.Decision - Class in org.sbrubbles.conditio
How a handler decided to handle a condition.
Handler.Operations - Interface in org.sbrubbles.conditio
The ways a handler can handle a condition.

I

ignore() - Static method in class org.sbrubbles.conditio.policies.Policies

N

notify(Condition, Restart<?>...) - Method in interface org.sbrubbles.conditio.Scope

O

on(Class<S>, Function<O, R>) - Static method in interface org.sbrubbles.conditio.Restart
Creates and returns a new restart, with a default implementation.
onHandlerNotFound(Condition, Scope) - Method in interface org.sbrubbles.conditio.policies.HandlerNotFoundPolicy
Called when no handler is found.
org.sbrubbles.conditio - package org.sbrubbles.conditio
Holds an implementation of a simple condition system.
org.sbrubbles.conditio.handlers - package org.sbrubbles.conditio.handlers
Provides some helpers for handler creation and management.
org.sbrubbles.conditio.policies - package org.sbrubbles.conditio.policies
Provides some alternatives to handle corner cases (e.g. no handlers for a condition), which are called policies.
org.sbrubbles.conditio.restarts - package org.sbrubbles.conditio.restarts
Provides some general use restarts and restart options.

P

Policies - Class in org.sbrubbles.conditio.policies

R

raise(Condition, Restart<T>...) - Method in interface org.sbrubbles.conditio.Scope
Signals a condition that must be handled and return a result.
restart(Restart.Option) - Method in interface org.sbrubbles.conditio.Handler.Operations
Invokes a previously set recovery strategy.
restart(Restart.Option) - Static method in class org.sbrubbles.conditio.handlers.Handlers
A handler body that invokes the restart matching the given option.
Restart<R> - Interface in org.sbrubbles.conditio
Represents a recovery strategy.
Restart.Option - Interface in org.sbrubbles.conditio
Serves both as input for restarts, and a way to select which restart to use: the earliest-bound one in the stack which accepts it.
RestartNotFoundException - Exception in org.sbrubbles.conditio
Thrown when no working restart for a given restart option was found.

Restarts - Class in org.sbrubbles.conditio.restarts
Some general use restarts and restart options, ready for consumption.
resume() - Static method in class org.sbrubbles.conditio.restarts.Restarts
A restart, that also works as its own restart option, which continues execution "without" returning a value.
Resume<R> - Class in org.sbrubbles.conditio.restarts
A restart which indicates that execution may proceed "without" returning a value.
Resume() - Constructor for class org.sbrubbles.conditio.restarts.Resume

S

Scope - Interface in org.sbrubbles.conditio
A scope is a resource which hosts this library's main machinery.
Scopes - Class in org.sbrubbles.conditio

signal(Condition, HandlerNotFoundPolicy<T>, Restart<T>...) - Method in interface org.sbrubbles.conditio.Scope

T

U
